value:
$WmMPID_マークス,ch00_04_Veronica_FM_Pair,Face|Princess Veronica.$k$p$nMPID_双界ヴェロニカ|Yes, Xander?$k$p$nMPID_マークス|I've thought of a way to make this
festival enjoyable for you.$k$pSeeing as one of the main interests
of pirates is in recovering lost riches...$k$pI thought you might enjoy a little
treasure hunt.$k$p$nMPID_双界ヴェロニカ|What am I hunting, exactly?$k$p$nMPID_マークス|That's a surprise. I've hidden it
nearby, so feel free to begin
your search at any time.$k$p$nMPID_双界ヴェロニカ|I admit, I am curious...$k$p

$WmMPID_双界ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_FM_Pair,Face|A lone chest in the middle of the
forest. Suspicious...$k$pThis is your hidden treasure,
isn't it, Xander?$k$p$nMPID_マークス|Well done. Open it up.$k$p$nMPID_双界ヴェロニカ|Tea leaves... And two cups as well...$k$p$nMPID_マークス|For you and Prince Bruno to share,
upon his return.$k$p$nMPID_双界ヴェロニカ|The cups are nicely colored.
And the tea smells...nice.
I admit, I'm...pleased.$k$pThank you, Xander.$k$p$nMPID_マークス|My pleasure.$k$p$nMPID_双界ヴェロニカ|To show my appreciation...let me
brew you a cup.$k$pWould you take tea with me?$k$p$nMPID_マークス|This is a gift for you and your family,
Princess. I cannot accept.$k$p$nMPID_双界ヴェロニカ|I insist.$k$p$nMPID_マークス|In that case...very well. You know,
this reminds me of my own siblings.
They often made tea for me.$k$p$nMPID_双界ヴェロニカ|I would like to hear of them.$k$p$nMPID_マークス|Then I will tell you a few stories
as we take our tea.$k$p
